00028 import os
00029 
00030 ## @brief This helper function searches all available modules in a given directory.
00031 # It's used to scan the Plugins, Fields, View and Search directories.
00032 def scan( module, directory ):
00033         pluginImports = __import__(module, globals(), locals())
00034         # Check if it's being run using py2exe environment
00035         if hasattr(pluginImports, '__loader__'):
00036                 # If it's run using py2exe environment, all files will be in a single 
00037                 # zip file and we can't use listdir() to find all available plugins.
00038                 zipFiles = pluginImports.__loader__._files
00039                 moduleDir = '\\'.join( module.split('.') )
00040                 files = [zipFiles[file][0] for file in zipFiles.keys() if moduleDir in file]
00041                 files = [file for file in files if '__init__.py' in file]
00042                 for file in files:
00043                         d = os.path.dirname(file)
00044                         if d.endswith( moduleDir ):
00045                                 continue
00046                         newModule = os.path.basename(os.path.dirname(file))
00047                         __import__( '%s.%s' % (module, newModule), globals(), locals(), [newModule] ) 
00048         else:
00049                 for i in os.listdir(directory):
00050                         path = os.path.join( directory, i, '__init__.py' )
00051                         if os.path.isfile( path ):
00052                                 __import__( '%s.%s' % (module, i), globals(), locals(), [i] )
